speaker.whotheyare: A researcher and peacemaking practitioner with experience in conflict zones, Olivia Lazard knows that the fights for peace and for climate action are one and the same.
speaker.whylisten: Olivia Lazard focuses her efforts on systemic changes that help to rebuild ecological integrity -- the foundation for any type of security -- and to de-escalate the geopolitical tensions slowing down a collective energy transition. Her research and practice focuses on: supporting the European Union in adopting a new framework for ecological diplomacy in climate-disrupted futures; supporting the creation of a global public good regime to manage critical minerals collectively; and integrating ecological literacy and environmental regeneration in conflict resolution institutions and international security initiatives.
